long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Making vtop simpler and fun

We are just a group of passed out students, who aim to help our juniors.

Just a Simple vtop extension to simplify vtop experience


 - When you get not authorized error, this extension will help you by closing that tab and refreshing your vtop page.
 - Pop up window will be opened in new tab.

Release Date: 19th Mar 2018

If you want to some more bugs (which I am capable of correcting) to be fixed please mail me at navdeeshkumar@gmail.com

Features:
- Autofills the captcha for you at VIT Student & Parent Login (https://vtop.vit.ac.in/vtop, https://vtop.vit.ac.in/vtop/parentLogin)

*Updated for the latest Captcha*

*Works on Refreshing Captcha*

* No more not Authorised. If it sees you are facing not authorised issues, it will close that tab and get you a new vtop session.

* Pop up window will open in new tab.
